value:
$WmMPID_双界外伝カチュア,ch10_20_Katua_FF_Pair,Face|I apologize for calling on you when
you are so busy, Saul.$k$p$WmMPID_立会人サウル,ch02_33_Saul_M_Wedding21,Face|No, no, wherever there is a bride
in need, I will gladly lend my aid.
How can I help?$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シャニー,ch02_11_Thany_F_Wedding21,Face|Well... I was hoping you'd be willing
to perform a ceremony for my sister
Juno and her husband, Zelot.$k$p$WmMPID_立会人サウル,ch02_33_Saul_M_Wedding21,Face|Juno and her husband, Zelot?
Correct me if I'm wrong, but...
are they not already married?$k$p$WmMPID_ティト,ch10_20_Katua_FF_Pair,Face|You're right, but their first ceremony,
in Ilia, was very simple...$k$pThe two of them were happy with
what they had, of course, but we're
here with these lavish outfits now...$k$pI thought, if we held a ceremony now,
it would make for a lovely memory
the two of them can share.$k$p$nMPID_双界外伝カチュア|I've been helping make preparations
in secret.$k$pAll we need is someone to perform
the ceremony... Will you help us,
Saul? Please?$k$p$WmMPID_立会人サウル,ch02_33_Saul_M_Wedding21,Face|Ah... Such love between sisters
is moving indeed...$k$pI understand. If you wish for me to
perform the ceremony, I will gladly
take part.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シャニー,ch02_11_Thany_F_Wedding21,Face|Yay! Thank you, Saul!$k$p$WmMPID_ティト,ch10_20_Katua_FF_Pair,Face|Now, let's hurry up and get registered
for the tournament.$k$p$WmMPID_立会人サウル,ch02_33_Saul_M_Wedding21,Face|...Hm? A tournament?$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シャニー,ch02_11_Thany_F_Wedding21,Face|That's right! Whoever finds the
hidden bridal bouquet wins!$k$pThe winner gets a special ceremony
in their name at the end.$k$p$WmMPID_ティト,ch10_20_Katua_FF_Pair,Face|We've got to get that bouquet so we
can perform the ceremony! Not even
death will keep me from it!$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シャニー,ch02_11_Thany_F_Wedding21,Face|Right! So get ready, Saul!$k$p$WmMPID_立会人サウル,ch02_33_Saul_M_Wedding21,Face|Yes. Right. Erm...let's all do our best
out there!$k$p...Hm. I thought being surrounded
by so many beauties would be like
ascending into heaven, but now...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_ティト,ch10_20_Katua_FF_Pair,Face|Sorry for dragging you into this,
Catria, all to help my sister...$k$p$nMPID_双界外伝カチュア|No need to apologize, Thea. I have
sisters too, so I understand what
they mean to you. We WILL win!$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シャニー,ch02_11_Thany_F_Wedding21,Face|We'll all do our best for Juno!
Right, Saul!?$k$p$WmMPID_立会人サウル,ch02_33_Saul_M_Wedding21,Face|Hm? Oh, right. Yes, of course.$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_花嫁シャニー,ch02_11_Thany_F_Wedding21,Face|Oh no! My dress is getting ruined!$k$p$WmMPID_ティト,ch10_20_Katua_FF_Pair,Face|We're sure to lose if things keep
up like this... Retreat for now!$k$p$Sbs150|
